oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Nashville Mayor Ben West giving presentation, 1951
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photgraph of Nashville Mayor Ben West giving a presentation on annexation, 1951. The residents of the subdivision known as Urbandale signed a petition to be annexed by the city in October of 1951. The photo shows Mayor West giving a speech related to this issue. b & w; 3 x 4 in.
